title: New tips
body:
So just saw one of the new tips, it takes 3 hours and 20 minutes to go from fountain to fountain without masterys only using flash.

Now i know what riot employees do all day.

replies.body: My favourite is "if you a 50 gold short for an item, just kill the enemy Nexus"

> [{quoted}](name=BarryButcher,realm=OCE,application-id=Ntey9fRZ,discussion-id=f3U0tAw1,comment-id=0001,timestamp=2015-02-22T07:17:46.761+0000)
>
> My favourite is "if you a 50 gold short for an item, just kill the enemy Nexus"

Definitely my favourite too :p
They were community made, not made by riot.
that's like a 30 second calculation, you just need to know the distances.
